episode_event_trainersfile_hayato/4001_1:
You won’t be able to fool my eyes or Noctowl’s
with a sloppy ambush like that.

Noctowl’s eyes can see in pitch-darkness, and it
never lets its prey escape. Some even call it “the
emperor of dark nights”...

In order to be in sync with Noctowl, my father put
me through tough training in total darkness.

This means my father is better than your
father Koga!
Wait! I-I may have lost to you...
but that doesn’t mean my father lost!

Heh... Why don’t you just accept that my father is
greater than yours?

That means if we steal both of your Pokémon,
we’ll be the strongest!
Mwahahaha! Team Rocket’s in the house!

We were waiting for this moment when you’d be
tired after training!

We should be able to take on a couple of tired,
inexperienced Gym Leaders!
Now, we’re gonna take your Pokémon!
Don’t underestimate us! Let’s go, Janine!

I’ll show you the power of Noctowl flying
magnificently in the night sky!
episode_event_trainersfile_hayato/4002_1:
Mwahahaha! Beating Flying-type Pokémon is a
piece of cake. All you gotta do is use electric
attacks!

Scowl at me all you want! It won’t change
a thing!
All right! Let’s finish this off!

You can’t lay a hand on me, as poison brings your
steady doom...
That’s the essence of ninjas’ moves!
Hehe! Got a better impression of me?
Yeah, I take back what I said...

Koga’s techniques are amazing. I understand
that now.
H-huh? Your attitude sure did a 180...

Well, if you can see how great my father is now,
that’s all that matters.

(I think it’ll take some more time for me to become
as strong as you.)
(Until I can fly sky-high with my bird Pokémon...)
(I hope you’re watching me battle from above!)
